typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		host_id as integer,
		latitude as double,
		longitude as double,
		price as float,
		minimum_nights as integer,
		number_of_reviews as integer,
		last_review as date,
		reviews_per_month as float,
		calculated_host_listings_count as integer,
		availability_365 as integer,
		name as string,
		host_name as string,
		neighborhood as string,
		room_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ReadPostingData
ReadPostingData aggregate(groupBy(host_id,
		host_name),
	min_price = min(price),
		max_price = max(price),
		avg_price = round(avg(price), 2),
		total_reviews = sum(number_of_reviews),
		avg_availability = round(avg(availability_365), 2)) ~> TopHosts
TopHosts sort(desc(total_reviews, true)) ~> SortMostReviews
ReadPostingData aggregate(groupBy(neighborhood),
	total_reviews = sum(number_of_reviews),
		min_price = min(price),
		max_price = max(price),
		avg_price = round(avg(price), 2),
		avg_availability = round(avg(availability_365), 2)) ~> TopNeighborhood
TopNeighborhood sort(desc(total_reviews, true)) ~> SortMostReviewsForNeighborhood
ReadPostingData window(over(neighborhood),
	desc(number_of_reviews, true),
	Rank = rank()) ~> GetTopPostingByNeighborhood
GetTopPostingByNeighborhood filter(Rank<=10) ~> FilterForTop10Postings
SortMostReviews sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTopHosts
SortMostReviewsForNeighborhood sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteTopNeighborhoods
FilterForTop10Postings sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteTop10NeighborhoodPostings
